scene_description_enriched: A bearded bishop, wearing a red mitre and a dark cope, stands in a landscape. He holds a blue book in his left hand and a crozier in his right. A small, dog-like animal with pointed ears stands at his feet. In the background, stylized trees and rolling hills are depicted, with a city featuring red towers and blue domes in the distance. The scene is rendered in a flat, stylized manner typical of medieval manuscript illumination.
